p: Reported cases with SARS-CoV-2 are now more prevalent, and as of 10 August 2020, 19.9â€‰M cases have been reported in 203 countries, and the number of death stands at 49,242 in the world [ 28] at 14:57 GMT. At present, available data shows that SARS-CoV-2 which infected the human population originated from a bat source, at present, available data shows that SARS-CoV-2 which infected the human population originated from a bat source, Pangolins have been cited as possible intermediate between humans and bats.
